attributes.action: Government causing MEAL DEALs to be end
attributes.additional_details:
Millions of elderly people shop at stores such as M&S to purchase meals on their deals such as the:         £10 MEAL DEAL Weekends.
Yes alcohol can be purchase in the deal, but this is in the main wines.  The restricted budget of pensioners, as well as those 'low paid workers', make such offers great benefits in this ever increasing price rising environment. The bottle of wine effectively a treat.  These people arn't alcoholics or Anti-Social individuals.
Stand up to proposals by government, contact your minister, & vote to curtail the idiotic proposals which penalise the majority because of the irresponsible minority.
Charge those abusers for their medical treatments.  (likewise smokers & illegal substance abusers)
